description: Lemmas applicable to r-uniform hypergraph generalization

generalization_mapping.r=3_is_tuza: Our Tuza lemmas are the r=3 special case

our_lemmas_that_generalize.name: intersecting_family_structure
our_lemmas_that_generalize.r3_version: Pairwise sharing triangles → star OR K4
our_lemmas_that_generalize.r_generalized: Pairwise sharing r-edges → common (r-1)-face OR bounded vertex set
our_lemmas_that_generalize.lean_r_version: lemma intersecting_hyperedges_structure (H : Hypergraph V r) (F : Finset (Finset V)) (h_edges : F ⊆ H.edges) (h_pair : ∀ e1 e2 ∈ F, (e1 ∩ e2).card ≥ r-1) : (∃ face : Finset V, face.card = r-1 ∧ ∀ e ∈ F, face ⊆ e) ∨ (F.biUnion id).card ≤ r+1

our_lemmas_that_generalize.name: tau_star
our_lemmas_that_generalize.lean_r_version: lemma tau_star_hypergraph (H : Hypergraph V r) (F : Finset (Finset V)) (face : Finset V) (hface : face.card = r-1) (h_sub : ∀ e ∈ F, face ⊆ e) : coveringNumber H F ≤ 1

our_lemmas_that_generalize.name: structural_cover
our_lemmas_that_generalize.lean_r_version: lemma structural_cover_hypergraph (H : Hypergraph V r) (F : Finset (Finset V)) (h_pair : ∀ e1 e2 ∈ F, (e1 ∩ e2).card ≥ r-1) : coveringNumber H F ≤ (r+1)/2 + 1

our_lemmas_that_generalize.name: inductive_bound
our_lemmas_that_generalize.lean_r_version: lemma inductive_bound_hypergraph (H : Hypergraph V r) (e : Finset V) (he : e ∈ H.edges) : coveringNumber H ≤ coveringNumber H (T_e H e) + coveringNumber H (H.edges \ T_e H e)

our_lemmas_that_generalize.name: lemma_2_2
our_lemmas_that_generalize.lean_r_version: lemma S_e_pairwise_share_hypergraph (H : Hypergraph V r) (M : Finset (Finset V)) (hM : isMaxPacking H M) (e : Finset V) (he : e ∈ M) : ∀ f1 f2 ∈ S H e M, (f1 ∩ f2).card ≥ r-1

new_hypergraph_lemmas_needed.name: hypergraph_cover_bound
new_hypergraph_lemmas_needed.target_statement: theorem aharoni_zerbib (H : Hypergraph V r) : coveringNumber H ≤ ((r+1)/2).ceil * packingNumber H
